name: punchcard
description: The API will be used as a foundation for a new service called "punchcard.com", where companies and their users can register, and users can then issue a "punch". When they've collected enough punches (usually 10), they will get a discount at the company (perhaps a free meal at a restaurant after buying 10 meals, or 20% discount of their next purchase at some shop etc.).
author: Jón Freysteinn Jónsson
